title: Peptide Therapy
description: Advanced Medical & Wellness Center, located in Beavercreek Ohio specializes in healing & correction of neuromusculoskeletal conditions.
cleaned_text: We are now offering Peptide Therapy for weight loss! This is a new FDA approved therapy as of 2021. Peptides are an exciting way to boost your ability to lose weight and attain those fitness goals! What is Peptide therapy? In recent years, peptides have been a growing part of the healthcare field. They have been used successfully for a wide variety of conditions. Our bodies naturally produce peptides but as we age the number and quality of specific peptides may decline.
